member.name: M:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.BasePlugin.AddComponent``1
member.summary: Add a Component (e.g. MonoBehaviour) into Unity scene. Automatically registers the type with Il2Cpp Type system if it isn't already.
member.typeparam: Type of the component to add.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.IL2CPPChainloader.AddUnityComponent``1
member.summary: Register and add a Unity Component (for example MonoBehaviour) into BepInEx global manager. Automatically registers the type with Il2Cpp type system if it isn't initialised already.
member.typeparam: Type of the component to add.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.IL2CPPChainloader.AddUnityComponent(System.Type)
member.summary: Register and add a Unity Component (for example MonoBehaviour) into BepInEx global manager. Automatically registers the type with Il2Cpp type system if it isn't initialised already.
member.param: Type of the component to add

member.name: E:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.IL2CPPChainloader.PluginLoad
member.summary: Occurs after a plugin is instantiated and just before is called.

member.name: M:Doorstop.Entrypoint.Start
member.summary: The main entrypoint of BepInEx, called from Doorstop.
